title: Linux lpr Command with Practical Examples
description: Learn how to use the lpr command in Linux to print text files and PDF documents. Explore practical examples and understand the command's functionality.

meta.title: Linux lpr Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Learn how to use the lpr command in Linux to print text files and PDF documents. Explore practical examples and understand the command's functionality.
meta.keywords: Linux, lpr command, print, text file, PDF, command line, networking, communication

verify.name: Verify the text file was printed
verify.hint: It seems the text file was not printed successfully. Please check the `lpr` command and try again.
